Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aussie Resort in Burleigh Heads, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Burleigh Beach, and close to Burleigh Head National Park. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Burleigh Golf Club and Pizzey Park Sporting Complex.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Aussie Resort in Burleigh Heads, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Burleigh Beach, and close to Burleigh Head National Park. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Burleigh Golf Club and Pizzey Park Sporting Complex.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Burleigh Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Burleigh Head National Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Burleigh Golf Club - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Pizzey Park Sporting Complex - 3 km / 1.9 mi
David Fleay Wildlife Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Bond University - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Mallawa Drive Sports Complex - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Gold Coast Seniors Tennis Club - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Putt Putt Golf Mermaid Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Dracula's Queensland - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Pacific Fair Shopping Centre - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Broadbeach Sports and Recreation Centre - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Oracle Boulevard - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Pratten Park - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Jupiters Casino - 6 km / 3.7 mi

The preferred airport for Aussie Resort is Gold Coast, QLD (OOL-Coolangatta) - 11.3 km / 7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
